input.sentences: today was the day [male] was going to meet up with some fellow bike riders for a race .
[male] taking a pic before the race .
[male] trying to get his bike just right before the race .
all the competitors arrive and it 's time to start the race .
after the race is over they all smile and take a picture together .
output.sentences: The riders in the race planned to meet at the big tree.
The riders, including this one, enjoyed taking a pic of themselves.
During the race, a male biker helped another rider fix their bike.
The time of the start of the race was luckily at a beautiful time.
The bikers all smile in the picture to close out the race.
